p.k: Art, Classic Spain (1961). Hrají: Silvia Pinal, Francisco Rabal, Fernando Rey, Jose Calvo. Režie: Luis Bunuel.
p.d: Viridiana, a young nun about to take her final vows, pays a visit to her widowed uncle at the request of her Mother Superior. Regarded by many as Buńuel’s crowning achievement while the Spanish government suppressed the film on the grounds of blasphemy and obscenity. A despairing picture of the dark cavern of the human heart.
